item.description: Enjoy a change of pace at Drumlin Farm, where you and your family can explore a real working farm and a wildlife sanctuary all in one day. Kids of all ages love visiting the animals on the farmyard, trying their green thumbs in the learning garden, and riding on the hay wagon. Browse the wildlife exhibits or hike to the top of the drumlin, one of the highest points in the greater Boston area. Meet at the entrance. For more information visit drumlinfarm@massaudubon.org
item.name: Family Activity:Dig into Nature at Drumlin Farm
